title: Gone for the week :)
body: Gonna go to school camp for the week. Hopefully by the time I come back Kat will have another nerf, Kassadin wonâ€™t get his ultimate rekt and Riot will give out more information on the next champion?

replies.body: I kinda quit-ish but like, it's against my will to quit so I'm still playing whenever I can which is no longer as often, thats for sure
kat doesn't need nerfs tho lmao.
